title: Five-a-day soup
ingredients: ['2 vegetable stock cubes', '1.2L (2 pt) boiling water', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 medium to large potato', '2 carrots', '1 red pepper', '1 large onion', '6 button mushrooms', '1 generous handful fresh green vegetables - broccoli, cabbage, leek or kale', 'parsley to garnish']
